data.text: “Ule-nai khat-um pa ngai, kei'n tuun nangni diangnga ka-inngaakna chong kiril narangaipiru.”
Ama'n inmani diang Hebrew chongnga irilkha injetpha, inmani'n injuo omchian; halli Paul in ati:

“Kei Cilicia ram Tarsus ah innei Jihudi inkhat ka-eii, takkha hiwa khuopui Jerusalem hin Gamaliel diang ka-inchu ah hongkalok ka-eii, kei nipi nipu ngai Sinadan kacheet ah kajuiya kahong-inchu, nangni rakip in wini ningtho angnga, kei innum Pathian sik bitkhan ka-inpesuok.” Chuon 5:34-39
Halli pasal numeisa rakip kasurra mikhumna khan kada-ah, inmani thina katung kei'n hiwa Pathian minchuna Lam kajui mi ngaikha kaleiminpoong-kaleiminraal. Chuon 8:3; 26:9-11

Hiwa jarra Thiampu Kalian khat-um sanhedrin rakip in kei sakhi in-eii. Inmani diangnga inphut kei'n ule-nai ngai diangnga pesik chemajia ngaikha kamu ah, Damascus ah kaom hiwa mi ngai kha um rachaaknasik, khat-um khit-ah Jerusalem tiang juoruoinasik kei'n khawakhan kaleisi.
Kei'n hinthoa kasiya Damascus kaheinai pha hintia asuokjei, kani hong-inding siktiang, jetlei-theileiya kasir kapangnga marwaanna inphut akawartak ra-ang inkhat in ajuowarjei.
Halli kei nuoipilla kapurjei, halli rasa inkhat in keidiang, Saul, Saul, nang in kei angsikme ninaminpoong? iti kei'n kaleijet.
Kei'n kamasang, nang tu na-eme Pumi? halli ama'n keidiang ati, keichu nang in ninaminpoong Nazareth Jisu kha ka-eii.
Keile hei-inruoi mi ngaikhan ra-ang khachu inmu, takkha kei diangnga iril ama rasa khachu inmani'n leijetmu.
Halli kei'n kati, kei'n angme kathosik, Pumi? halli ama'n keidiang ati, inthei-inlang Damascus ah luutro, khawa munkhan Pathian in ikadangsa nathosik chuon rakip jarra nangdiang namindik inte.
Khawa kawar ra-ang khan kamit leimumongnga, kihei-inruoipui ngaikhan kakut inma-ouwa, kei'n Damascus ah kaheiwajei.
Khawa munna kaom Jihudi rakip in khoya intho, eini Sinadan kajui Pathian kangamna araming Ananias Jihudi inkhat aleiom.
Ama kakoolla aheiwali, kakoolla angirra keidiang ati, Kasuopui Saul, nang mutaro! khawapha takkhan kei'n woikhat muna kaneiya amadiang kahong-enjei.
Halli ama'n ati, nipi-nipu ngai Pathian khan nang in ama lungdou jetnasik ah, ama Asuok kadik kha munasik ah, khat-um arasatak kha jetnasik ah anakadangjei.
Ajarchu nang in mirakip maikuungnga nimu nijet rakip karilpisik sakhi na-esik eii.
Tuun angsikme nilangaak? intheiro, ama raming koi-inlang baptize thoro halli namanu insuthiangtaro ati.
Kei'n Jerusalemma kaheikirli, Biak-inn khan Pathian kanilai, kei'n mangtalar inkhat kaleimu,
innotro, Jerusalem makheiya innot ah suokro, ajarchu kei jarra nang sakhi inmani'n leinunujei, tia keidiang kati Pumi kha kaleimu.
Kei'n katia, Pumi, inmani rakip in injetwiak, kei'n synagogue rakip ah nang kanangamna ngaikha mikhumna ah kaleida halli kawuok um kaleiwuok.
Halli nang nasakhi ka-eii Stephen inthatlai, kei um khawakhan kaomma, inthat kha kaleizoot khat-um akathat ngai puondiar kha kareiipi kalei-eii. Chuon 7:58
Halli ama'n keidiang ati, suokro; ajarchu kei'n nanghi hiwahinna inphut kalaak ah zaatlop ngaidiang kanatirsik eii.
Inmani'n hiwa katung achonghi inrangaili; inmani rasa inringnga inkheek ah inti, hiwa ka-ang mi hi nuoipilchung makheiya thatru, ajarchu ama karing sik rahoi suokmak.
Inmani'n inkheek ah, inpuondiar inkalek ah marwaan tiang rahut inwor pha,
Rome raalmi lamkakeipa in ama chungnga hituk Jihudi ngai'n inkheekna jar kha jetna sik, ama kha wuokna sik chong apeya, amakha raalmi ngai omna innkhan ruoitaru tia chong apejei.
Inmani'n ama kha inkhit ah inwuok pha, Paul in akoolla kangir raalmi rajakhat lamkakeipa diang ati, “Rome mi ngaihi iteii amasialna muleiya ningwuok hi nangni chongtanbe?”
Rajakhat lamkakeipa khan khawa ajetpha, ama'n raalmi lamkakeipa diang asiya aleiti, “Nang angme natho sik? ajarchu hiwa mi hi Rome miring eii!”
Khawa jarra raalmi lamkakeipa khan asiya Paul diang aleirakel, keidiang tiro, nang Rome miring na-ebe?
Raalmi lamkakeipa khan ati, “Kei'n aman katamtak kapeya Rome miring inkhat kihongchang eii.”
Khawa phatak ama diangnga chongkarakel sik ngaikha nuktiang inkirjei; halli raalmi lamkakeipa innum ama Rome mi eii ti ajetpha, ama um Paul aleikhit jarra achijei.

Takkha ziingkhuo ahongwarli Jihudi ngai'n angjarra amasialna inpeme ti inthiangnga ajetzoot ah, ama kha amasuojei, halli thiampu kalian ngaile uparup rakip intuupru tia chong apeli, Paul ajuoruoiya, inmani maikuungnga amin-ngirjei.
